Class Utility

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.Utility
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController, AmazonController, ApiExceptionHandler, ArtistController, AuthenticationController, AuthenticationServiceImpl, EventController, EventOrganiserController, EventOrganiserServiceImpl, EventTypeController, OrderController, SectionController, TicketController, UserController, VenueController
public class Utility extends Object
A utility class containing various helper methods for common tasks.

      message - The message to include in the response.
      Returns:

    • checkIfEventExistsAndIsApprovedAndNotDeleted

      public void checkIfEventExistsAndIsApprovedAndNotDeleted(Integer eventId)
      Checks if an event exists, is approved, and not deleted.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to check.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - If the event does not exist.
      AlreadyDeletedException - If the event is already deleted.
      NotApprovedException - If the event is not approved.

    • retrieveUserFromRequest

      public User retrieveUserFromRequest(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws NonExistentException
      Retrieves a User object from the request using the JWT token.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request containing the JWT token.
      Returns:
      The User object derived from the JWT token.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - If the user cannot be derived from the token.

      public EventOrganiser retrieveOrganiserFromRequest(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws NonExistentException

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • isAdminRequest

      public Boolean isAdminRequest(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws NonExistentException
      Checks if a request is made by an admin based on the JWT token.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request containing the JWT token.
      Returns:
      True if the request is made by an admin; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - If the admin cannot be derived from the token.
